snippet.title: Final Vendetta - Gameplay Preview
snippet.description:
Are you READY for FINAL VENDETTA? It's time for a Game Preview!

Pre-Order from Limited Run Games (Pre-Orders end Sunday 29th May): https://bit.ly/LRGFinalVendetta
Pre-Order from Numskull Games: https://bit.ly/FinalVendetta
Steam page: https://bit.ly/FVSTEAM

Final Vendetta is a side-scrolling beat ‘em up, paying homage to the iconic arcade titles of the 80’s and 90’s such as Double Dragon and Final Fight. Playable either in solo or co-op mode, Final Vendetta pulls no punches, with a unique story, four different game modes and a thumping dance/techno soundtrack by Featurecast which also features four exclusive 
tracks from 90’s chart-topping electronic dance duo, Utah Saints.

Final Vendetta will be released digitally on all platforms including Steam and 
Xbox with physical editions being available for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch - including a limited run of special editions featuring exclusive merchandise.

More information will be revealed soon. Follow @NumskullGames on Twitter: https://twitter.com/NumskullGames for the latest updates.

To stay up-to-date follow our social channels:
https://twitter.com/NumskullGames
https://www.facebook.com/gaming/numskullgames
